verses.verse: Moreover the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me, Take <WH3947> thee a great <WH1419> roll <WH1549>, and write <WH3789> in it with a man's <WH582> pen <WH2747> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz <WH4122>. Mahershalalhashbaz: Heb. In making speed to the spoil he hasteneth the prey, or, Make speed, etc
And I took <WH5749> unto me faithful <WH539> witnesses <WH5707> to record <WH5749>, Uriah <WH223> the priest <WH3548>, and Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jeberechiah <WH3000>.

And I went <WH7126> unto the prophetess <WH5031>; and she conceived <WH2029>, and bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>. Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> to me, Call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Mahershalalhashbaz <WH4122>. went: Heb. approached

For before the child <WH5288> shall have knowledge <WH3045> to cry <WH7121>, My father <WH1>, and my mother <WH517>, the riches <WH2428> of Damascus <WH1834> and the spoil <WH7998> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be taken away <WH5375> before <WH6440> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804>. the riches: or, he that is before the king of Assyria shall take away the riches, etc
The LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> also unto me again <WH3254>, saying <WH559>,

Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> refuseth <WH3988> the waters <WH4325> of Shiloah <WH7975> that go <WH1980> softly <WH328>, and rejoice <WH4885> in Rezin <WH7526> and Remaliah's <WH7425> son <WH1121>;

Now therefore, behold, the Lord <WH136> bringeth up <WH5927> upon them the waters <WH4325> of the river <WH5104>, strong <WH6099> and many <WH7227>, even the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804>, and all his glory <WH3519>: and he shall come up <WH5927> over all his channels <WH650>, and go over <WH1980> all his banks <WH1415>:

And he shall pass <WH2498> through Judah <WH3063>; he shall overflow <WH7857> and go over <WH5674>, he shall reach <WH5060> even to the neck <WH6677>; and the stretching out <WH4298> of his wings <WH3671> shall fill <WH4393> the breadth <WH7341> of thy land <WH776>, O Immanuel <WH6005> <WH410>. stretching: Heb. fulness of the breadth of thy land shall be the stretchings out of his wings

Associate <WH7489> yourselves, O ye people <WH5971>, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865>; and give ear <WH238>, all <WH3605> ye of far <WH4801> countries <WH776>: gird <WH247> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865>; gird <WH247> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <WH2865>. people and: or, people, yet
Take <WH5779> counsel <WH6098> together <WH5779>, and it shall come to nought <WH6565>; speak <WH1696> the word <WH1697>, and it shall not stand <WH6965>: for God <WH410> is with us.

For the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH559> thus to me with a strong <WH2393> hand <WH3027>, and instructed <WH3256> me that I should not walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of this people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, with: Heb. in strength of hand
Say <WH559> ye not, A confederacy <WH7195>, to all them to whom this people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, A confederacy <WH7195>; neither fear <WH3372> ye their fear <WH4172>, nor be afraid <WH6206>.
Sanctify <WH6942> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> himself; and let him be your fear <WH4172>, and let him be your dread <WH6206>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary <WH4720>; but for a stone <WH68> of stumbling <WH5063> and for a rock <WH6697> of offence <WH4383> to both <WH8147> the houses <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, for a gin <WH6341> and for a snare <WH4170> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.
And many <WH7227> among them shall stumble <WH3782>, and fall <WH5307>, and be broken <WH7665>, and be snared <WH3369>, and be taken <WH3920>.
Bind up <WH6887> the testimony <WH8584>, seal <WH2856> the law <WH8451> among my disciples <WH3928>.
And I will wait <WH2442> upon the LORD <WH3068>, that hideth <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and I will look <WH6960> for him.

Behold, I and the children <WH3206> whom the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> me are for signs <WH226> and for wonders <WH4159> in Israel <WH3478> from the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, which dwelleth <WH7931> in mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>.

And when they shall say <WH559> unto you, Seek <WH1875> unto them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, and unto wizards <WH3049> that peep <WH6850>, and that mutter <WH1897>: should not a people <WH5971> seek <WH1875> unto their God <WH430>? for the living <WH2416> to the dead <WH4191>?
To the law <WH8451> and to the testimony <WH8584>: if they speak <WH559> not according to this word <WH1697>, it is because there is no light <WH7837> in them. no: Heb. no morning

And they shall pass <WH5674> through it, hardly bestead <WH7185> and hungry <WH7457>: and it shall come to pass, that when they shall be hungry <WH7456>, they shall fret <WH7107> themselves, and curse <WH7043> their king <WH4428> and their God <WH430>, and look <WH6437> upward <WH4605>.
And they shall look <WH5027> unto the earth <WH776>; and behold trouble <WH6869> and darkness <WH2825>, dimness <WH4588> of anguish <WH6695>; and they shall be driven <WH5080> to darkness <WH653>.
